meanings.definition: A commander of a thousand soldiers.
meanings.sent1: The chiliarch led a group of one thousand soldiers into battle.
meanings.sent2: The chiliarch organized the troops into units of one thousand each.
meanings.sent3: The chiliarch joked that counting to a thousand soldiers felt like counting sheep.
meanings.sent4: The chiliarch's presence on the battlefield was like a beacon guiding the troops.
meanings.sent5: The chiliarch's responsibility was as heavy as a bag filled with a thousand stones.

meanings.definition: A military officer in charge of a thousand men.
meanings.sent1: The chiliarch commanded a large group of one thousand men during the operation.
meanings.sent2: The chiliarch ensured the well-being of all one thousand soldiers under his command.
meanings.sent3: The chiliarch's office was so crowded with a thousand men that he could barely move.
meanings.sent4: The chiliarch's authority over a thousand men was as solid as a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The chiliarch's leadership inspired each of the one thousand soldiers to give their best.
